title: Rambukkana police curfew lifted
body_lines: Police curfew which was imposed in the Rambukkana Police Division was lifted this morning at 5.00 am, the police said.

The police curfew was imposed April 19 following an unrest in the area where protestors blocking the main Kandy-Colombo railway line at Rambukkana and also the Rambukkana-Kegalle Road, and the Kurunegala and Mawanella roads entirely demanding solution to the fuel crisis.
